channel.title: FLF - Leadership Now Podcast
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: The Deadly Sin of Pride (Month) [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
June is upon us, which means it's time for another year of "pride month". In this episode, Aaron aptly speaks about the deadly sin of pride, how it coincides with the LGBTQ+ movement, ways in which it can sneakily take root in our lives, and how we as Christians can overcome the sin of pride through the finished work of Jesus Christ.

More Resources:

We are excited to partner with the Fight Laugh Feast Network to reach more listeners. Download the app here: https://subsplash.com/fightlaughfeastnetwork/app

 

More resources at Dr. Aaron Rock’s blog: Pursuit of Glory https://pursuitofglory.org/
item.author: FLF, LLC

item.title: The State of Law in Canada ft. Lawyer Marty Moore [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode, Aaron is joined by special guest Marty Moore, a Constitutional Litigator with the Justice Centre of Constitutional Freedoms. Marty and Aaron speak about the Charter of Rights and Freedoms, current attacks on our rights and liberties in culture, and practical steps you can take to make a positive change in your country's legal system.

More Resources:

We are excited to partner with the Fight Laugh Feast Network to reach more listeners. Download the app here: https://subsplash.com/fightlaughfeastnetwork/app
